title: Area of DG set, electric sub-station with protective walls having voids/perforated walls above 1 m h
clause_text: Area of DG set, electric sub-station with protective walls having voids/perforated walls above 1 m height, at stilt and podium level or in side and rear marginal open space, or in a separate independent structure specified in Regulation No 37(31)
